Reviews.Content: booked hotel reading reviews location bit nervous reading recent negative reviews location else – able walk sites rome able day freshen 20 min walk direction hotel able visit trevi fountain 1 minute walk morning crowds people arrived hotel close trevi easy street quiet night day outdated bathroom odd configuration leak ceiling bathroom paint chipping junior suite corner windows facing spacious separate sitting nice bright day night dark lights bed hard pillows flat tired didn’t matter shower bathtub shower head 2 sinks water pressure shower head oddly positioned splashed mentioned include linens handtowels towels bath towels cotton light worn material hotel nonsmoking ashtray – thankfully smell smoke stay wake loud noises floor 6am sounded furniture dragged unpleasant busy hotel booked arrived front desk hit miss – gentlemen helpful staff spoke english helpful italian existant gotten ripped taxi driver coming airport btw it’s fixed cost 40 euros 1 euro piece luggage – don’t convince otherwise there’s sign airport sign cab hotel staff understanding taxi driver trying charge explained 60 euros deal despite law passed taxi drivers overcharging hotel guest gotten ripped coming termini station 15 euros breakfast brag included charge surprisingly eat breakfast included breakfast convenient tasty supermarket street despar convenient store door cheaper supermarket frequented hotel separate car service airport 50 euros – driver polite ontime efficiently airport roomy black mercedes remind front desk booking car service guy told forgot actually reserve car loved location stay pleasant memorable recommend caveat outdated dark night

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, fantastic location!”
Reviews.Author: Buona23
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel daughter friend fault aspect stay check efficient staff friendly helpful spotlessly clean spacious 3 separate sitting walk wardrobe feel cramped anyway hotel situated beside trevi foutain sleep heard noise remarkable considering location breakfast included price fairly adequate choice cereals pastries etc choice hot foods paid 260 euros night bit pricier hotels stayed stay rome feel worth pleasant stay definitely consider booking hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location, unwelcoming reception”
Reviews.Author: Jules20
Reviews.Content: married beginning june lake como flew rome 4 nights honeymoon arrived tired late evening greeted name followed handed key welcome hoped married clean modern air con disappointed note bottled water mini bar priced paid £180 night stay reduced rate via expedia expect water provided breakfast fine hotel location walking distance attractions nice hotel ideal location view unwelcoming reception staff am afraid soured impression hotel wasnt honeymoon bothered

Reviews.Title: “THE WORST HOTEL EVER”
Reviews.Author: jules3883
Reviews.Content: husband recently stayed vacation italy stayed 4 nights worst experience hotel staff rude wouldnt help checked basically threw key dirty worst bedding sheets rough paper bathroom dirty towels thin wouldnt dry hotel staff directions wouldnt help breakfast included rate terrible packaged rolls coffee coffee machine gas station night leave rome hotel terrible recommend staying

Reviews.Title: “Top Quality Hotel In A Brilliant Location”
Reviews.Author: Knowledgeable_One
Reviews.Content: walked hotel easy hotel concierge provided details maps impossible lost hotel literally 30 trevi hotel staff friendly helpful booking hop sightseeing tickets breakfast hotel – lots choose lovely private balcony total surprise wasn’t expecting itgreat relaxing sightseeing dinner headed piazza navona evenings restaurants live entertainments excellent stayed rome 3 nights wish forward soon defiantly stay hotel delle nazioni

Reviews.Content: husband traveling 30 throughout caribbean mexico trip europe wonderful time stuck home due 20 inches snow ground started researching trip expedia entered travel dates list hotels available read trip advisor reviews hotels selected due reviews checkin quickest experienced porter read hotel europe definitely true fine clean nice hardwood floors flat screen tv minibar safe comfortable bed pillows wooden shutters kept street noise shower read reviews iron travel iron offer laundry services provide hair conditioner bring own nice terrace fifth floor breakfast scrambled eggs bacon tasty red orange juice croissants cereals cold meats cheese coffee fresh canned fruits yogurt included rate staff pleasant helpful location hotel evenings gelato trevi fountain walk attractions public bus vatican euro convenient front desk bus location bus stop grocery store block hotel restaurants closeby trip hotel

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable hotel, excellent location but a bit pricey!”
Reviews.Author: GardenerJim
Reviews.Content: excellent location trevi fountain quiet clean nicely decorated varied tasty buffet breakfast helpful reception staff stayed 5 star hotel cardiff £120 night spending £200 night hotel fewer amenities bit steep rome expensive euro isnt helping moment nevertheless theres spar shop hotel dont spend mini bar reasonable restaurant couple streets called via trips dark romes guided tour ostia antica excellent guide called massimo brought site life beautiful bernini sculptures galleria borghese book advance timed entry slot phone online doria pamphili pallazo beautiful lovely art audio guide

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel, Amazing Location. Don't hesitate, stay here!”
Reviews.Author: so_so_much_to_see
Reviews.Content: reviews stated hotel fantastic location rome walking distance metro short walk userfriendly hotel modern clean comfortable air conditioning fantastic hot weather hotel provided lovely breakfast plenty choice hot cold options staff helpful wouldnt hesitate recommend hotel family stop worrying book wont 4 star money

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel and location should be rated as 4+ star”
Reviews.Author: rayoflightcanada
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 days choose hotel based trip advisor reviews 2 weeks search surprised quality service professional classy staff excellent clean bathroom marble towels clean changed day breakfast excellent selection scrambled eggs boiled eggs fresh tasty croissant jam custard filled butter jam breads cheese cold cut meats fresh fruits fresh cappuccino available request location literally fontana de trevi hotel backyard 1 minute walk attractions 1520 minutes’ walk galleria alberto hotel taxi stand definitely recommend hotel travelers stay
